page.name: Hosted Private Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Hosted Private Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Hosted Private Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenances
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Hosted Private Cloud's service status notifications.

incidents.name: [Scheduled] [Global][PCC] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 5
incidents.message: Start time : 14/03/2022 08:00 UTC End time : 18/03/2022 18:00 UTC Description : If you are from wave 5 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager. Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted . If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)
